page.title: 17INTERVIEW-a retired couple
page.content: This married couple have lived in Compton Pauncefoot for about 10 years. They were attracted here from another country area by the slower pace of life.Entering 'village life',centred on the church,they considered very important and over the years they have taken considerable interest in the history of the village and its immediate locality and in doing so have made many friends in surrounding villages with similiar interests. Today they find themselves still able to maintain their desired style of living.Providing that they can retain the use of a car,health services,entertainment and cultural activities are easily available. Essential shopping can be delivered and the use of a freezer overcomes the problem of no village shop. They view the future with a degree
